item.title: FAQ
item.description: Question Index: How old are you? Where are you from? Where can I find you across the web? Are you going to school for Computer Science? What’s your day job? What languages do you know? What OS do you use? What’s your computer build? What keyboard do you use? What languages do you use for Game Development?

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: For access to most of these projects, you can go thru the descriptions, or check my GitHub for the relevant repositories!Please note: a few of these projects are still under active development, and are subject to change! Resume Astera Astera is one of my primary projects currently. It’s a cross platform game library written in C99. The technologies it uses are: C, CMake, GLFW, OpenGL, OpenAL, nanovg, stb image & vorbis, and GLAD.

item.title: Resume
item.description: .resume_wrapper { min-width 640px; width: 100%; display: inline-block; padding: 0; margin: 0; } .resume_left { width: 75%; margin-right: 10%; padding: 0; float: left; display: inline-block; } .resume_right { width: 15%; margin-left: 0; padding: 0; float: right; display: inline-block; } .resume_job { font-size: 1.3rem; display: block; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 10px !important; padding: 0; } .resume_date { font-size: 1.1rem; } .resume_jobdesc { font-size: 1.1rem; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 15px; } .resume_section { font-size: 1.

item.title: Services
item.description: You can find my resume here! Currently I’m offering the following services: Contracted Work Consulting Generally I work on the following kinds of projects: Games & Game Engines General & Enterprise Software Full Stack Web & Apps Here are some of the programming languages I’m most comfortable with: C/C++ Java C# / .NET HTML / CSS JavaScript SQL (MSSQL & MySQL) NoSQL BASH / Unix Shell If you have a project you’d like me to complete, let me know!
